meanings.definition: Suffering from or relating to gout.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed him with a gouty condition in his swollen toe.
meanings.sent2: Her gouty joints made it difficult for her to walk comfortably.
meanings.sent3: Despite his gouty foot, he still managed to dance at the party.
meanings.sent4: The gouty pain in his ankle felt like tiny needles stabbing him.
meanings.sent5: The gouty inflammation turned his toe into a red, throbbing mess.

meanings.sent1: The dish had a gouty taste due to the excessive use of salt.
meanings.sent2: The old man's gouty walk was slow and painful.
meanings.sent3: The gouty appearance of the building made it stand out among the modern structures.
meanings.sent4: The gouty smell of the cheese filled the room with a pungent aroma.
meanings.sent5: The gouty texture of the fabric reminded her of rough sandpaper.

meanings.sent1: His gouty diet triggered painful flare-ups in his joints.
meanings.sent2: The gouty medication helped alleviate the swelling in his foot.
meanings.sent3: The gouty foods in the buffet tempted him despite knowing the consequences.
meanings.sent4: Her gouty habits of excessive drinking worsened her health condition.
meanings.sent5: The gouty lifestyle of rich foods and little exercise led to his current state of discomfort.
